title: Rubber in roads
creator_credit: Maxwell Munden, Film Workshop and Dennis Shand
brief_description: Improvement of road surfaces by the discovery that mixing a small quantity of natural rubber powder with bitumen makes a harder wearing surface. Tests carried out in the laboratories of the British Rubber Producers Research Associations.
creator_credit_for_label: Maxwell Munden, Film Workshop and Dennis Shand
description: Improvement of road surfaces by the discovery that mixing a small quantity of natural rubber powder with bitumen makes a harder wearing surface. Tests carried out in the laboratories of the British Rubber Producers Research Associations.
